Content: In order to help cut down the increasing number of road accidents in the general area of Kilinochchi, Security Force Headquarters - Kilinochchi (SFHQ-KLN) conducted an awareness programme on ‘Road Accidents’ for All Ranks during 12 - 14 September. 442 Army personnel representing all units and motor transport sections listened to those lectures delivered by experienced Army personnel and the Police Constable U.N Nishantha of the Kilinochchi Police Station. The opening address was delivered by Lieutenant Colonel Arjuna Kodippili, Staff Officer I (Admin) of the SFHQ-KLN.
